description: Six men face charges of manslaughter over the deaths of five teenagers and a woman in central Italy.
title: Italy's Corinaldo tragedy: Pepper spray stampede suspects face judge
title_page: Italy's Corinaldo tragedy: Pepper spray stampede suspects face judge - BBC News
maintext: At least 1,400 people had gathered for the event in the small town near Ancona in the Marche region of central Italy. However, the venue was big enough for fewer than 900, police say.
